articles.title: Buffett’s Remaining $34 Billion Bank of America Stake Is Now Pure Profit - Bloomberg
articles.description: Warren Buffett’s continued disposals of Bank of America Corp. shares have now covered the billionaire’s investment cost, leaving him with a more than $34 billion stake that’s pure profit.
